title: The Evil Within version 1.03 + DLC's Multi 7 repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
The Evil Within + DLC Multi 7

Repack features:

 Do not cut/recoded;
 Voice Language : English;
 Subtitles: English,Russian,French,Italian,Deutsch,Espanol,Polski ;
 Precracked - install and play ;
 Final size: 36.2gb ;
 Game Version: 1.03;
 Xbox 360 Controller support: Yes ;
 Crack based on: RELOADED ;
 Operating system: Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (64bit only);

 32bit systems are not supported...
 DON'T TRY TO RUN IT ON A LEGACY HARDWARE AND THEN ASK HELP FOR CRASHING ISSUES !!

Split the setup files into less than less than 4.37gb chunks so that u can store it on 3 DVDx5...
Future RELOADED updates should be applicable as no files are cut except for voice languages other than english ....

System Requirements:
 OS: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8.1
 Processor: i7 or an equivalent with four plus core processor
 Memory: 4 GB RAM
 Graphics: GTX 460 or equivalent 1 GB VRAM card
 DirectX: Version 11

DLC included:
 -Season Pass
 -The Fighting Chance pack

Make sure you have around 45gb space free(temporary) in C:/ drive to avoid any unpacking issues.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open 'The Evil Within repack Mr DJ.Disc1.rar' using WinRar and extract the setup folder to any location, open the extracted folder.... 

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup.exe' (IMPORTANT) same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Just Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X,both Visual C++ updates[provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install'...play from desktop shortcut.... 

With updated version 1.03 , U have the ability to set the fps from 30 to 60 and remove the blackbars from ingame options and some performance increase ...

The system requirements are a bit exaggerated, the game runs fine on a good dual core CPU (i3 4th gen) , 4gb ram and a mid-high level graphics card with 2gb vram....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid crash/savegame issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from options ingame and make sure you meet the system requirements.

If you are still unable to get it working, feel free to ask here or drop a private message on my facebook page.

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
